about_the_game:
Test your management skills in a new game environment - Volatile markets.

A group of investors have funded the launch of various plants and factories in the region, and require your services - providing their industries with crucial raw materials once production has started.

Your railroad company will be paid for each delivery, however, it is necessary to take into account that it is a free market. Prices for raw materials and finished products can fluctuate, and it may be necessary to act accordingly.


As an option, you can invite a friend to attempt this challenge with you, as it is always better to have a reliable partner in business.

The Volatile Markets challenge can be played in single-player or in cooperative mode.
